scripts.build-lib-release: cargo-cp-artifact -nc build/Release/index.node -- cargo +nightly build --lib --message-format=json-render-diagnostics -Z build-std=std,panic_abort -Z build-std-features=panic_immediate_abort --release
scripts.build-receiver: cargo-cp-artifact -a bin crashtracker-receiver build/Debug/crashtracker-receiver -- cargo +nightly build --bin crashtracker-receiver --message-format=json-render-diagnostics
scripts.build-receiver-release: cargo-cp-artifact -a bin crashtracker-receiver build/Release/crashtracker-receiver -- cargo +nightly build --bin crashtracker-receiver --message-format=json-render-diagnostics -Z build-std=std,panic_abort -Z build-std-features=panic_immediate_abort --release
scripts.build-release: npm run build-receiver-release && npm run build-lib-release
